English Language and three (3)

Health Education, Health Superintendent Certificate and 
equivalent qualification.  (UNIZIK -Nursing only) plus the 
UTME requirements.  
(ix) EDALV accepts for thetwo(2) -year programme, NCE 
distinction or  credit in Physical and Health Education, 
Health Nursing and Midwifery tutors.  
(x) BAYERO accepts certificate in Nursing.  
(xi) UNIZIK requires 'O' levelcredit passes in English 
Language and Biology or Food and Nutrition for both the 
UTME and Direct Entry candidates.  
(xii) LASU accepts NCE merit in Physical Education and TC II 
in Arithmetic Process/Mathematics. It does not accept 
ND or HND.  
(xiii)EKSU accepts two (2) 'A' level/NCE passes in Biology and 
either Health Education or Integrated Science plus the 
UTME requirements.  
(xiv) BENIN  
(a) requires two (2) NCE merit one (1) of which should be 
Health Education, Biology or Integrated Science plus 
three (3) ‘O' level credit    passes including English 
Language at one (1) sitting.  
For Health Education  
(b) Registered Nurse Certificate and four (4) 'O' level credit 
passes at one (1) sitting including   English Language.  
(xv)BENIN  
(a)  requires two (2) or three (3) NCE merit chosen from 
Physical Education, Health Education, Biology and 
Integrated Science plus three (3) or two (2)'O'level credit 
passes including English Language at one (1) sitting.  
For Physical and Health Education  
(xvi)  OAU for Physical and Health Education accepts two (2) 
‘A’ level passes which could be from any of the following:  
NCE in Physical and Health Education plus the UMTE 
requirements, certificate in Nursing (RN) Health 
Education Community/Public Health/ Hygiene is 
acceptable asequivalents, NCE in Primary Education 
Studies/any other teaching subject is also acceptable.
